description:
Marital status

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12111 Census

Definition:
The variable indicates the legal marital status of an
individual. The legal marital status is recorded in
accordance with the Civil Status Act and the Act on
Registered Life Partnerships.

The information on "life partnerships" refers to
registered same-sex partnerships.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Marital status
